lead_paragraph: Triple jumper James Connolly won the United States' first gold medal at the 1896 Summer Games and it is expected that on Sunday or Monday a still unknown American will claim a milestone 1,000th gold to bookend 120 years of Olympic domination.

headline.main: U.S. Closing In on Milestone 1,000th Gold Medal
headline.print_headline: U.S. Closing In on Milestone 1,000th Gold Medal

snippet: Triple jumper James Connolly won the United States' first gold medal at the 1896 Summer Games and it is expected that on Sunday or Monday a still unknown American will claim a milestone 1,000th gold to bookend 120 years of Olympic domination....
